text:
Nice! I am doing alright to be honest! How are you? The new company is going well, feeling a bit more comfortable in what I am doing now which is good!

One of the other mentors on here has put together some videos on some Roto & Prep and comp stuff which he has here. I have had a breif look and it all seems pretty good! <https://www.chrisfryer.co.uk/training>

Give me a shout if you want me to talk through any techniques you have seen but might not fully understand!
